database.name: VIEW SCO_FACT_ACCT_INV_V
database.view: SELECT facct.fact_acct_id AS sco_fact_acct_inv_v_id, facct.ad_client_id, facct.ad_org_id, facct.created, facct.createdby, facct.updated, facct.updatedby, facct.isactive, facct.account_id AS c_elementvalue_id, facct.record_id AS c_invoice_id, facct.c_acctschema_id, facct.datetrx, facct.dateacct, facct.c_period_id, facct.gl_category_id, facct.c_tax_id, facct.postingtype, facct.c_currency_id, facct.amtsourcedr, facct.amtsourcecr, facct.amtacctdr, facct.amtacctcr, facct.c_uom_id, facct.qty, facct.m_product_id, facct.c_bpartner_id, facct.description, facct.fact_acct_group_id, facct.seqno, facct.factaccttype, facct.acctvalue, facct.acctdescription, facct.c_doctype_id, facct.c_costcenter_id, facct.em_sco_regnumber, valcom.c_validcombination_id FROM fact_acct facct, c_validcombination valcom WHERE facct.ad_table_id = '318' AND facct.account_id = valcom.account_id
